examples.korean: the principle that heat rises 발음듣기 더운 기운은 위로 올라간다는 법칙 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the principle that heat rises 발음

examples.korean: You can’t lay down hard and fast rules. 발음듣기 변경 불가능한 법칙을 정할 수는 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can’t lay down hard and fast rules. 발음

examples.korean: Away with all these rules and regulations! 발음듣기 이 모든 법칙과 규칙들이 없어졌으면 (좋겠어)! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Away with all these rules and regulations! 발음

examples.korean: It was Sod’s Law—the only day he could manage was the day I couldn’t miss work. 발음듣기 소드 법칙이라더니, 그가 간신히 시간을 낼 수 있는 단 하루가 나로서는 일을 쉴 수가 없는 날이었어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was Sod’s Law—the only day he could manage was the day I couldn’t miss work. 발음

examples.korean: It is a physical impossibility to be in two places at once. 발음듣기 동시에 두 장소에 있는 것은 자연법칙상으로 불가능한 일이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is a physical impossibility to be in two places at once. 발음
